dcterms:creator: N. Nangia
C. Vania

dcterms:description: CrowS-Pairs is a challenge dataset designed to measure social biases in masked language models, containing sentence pairs where the first sentence contains a target group and an attribute that is stereotypically associated with that group.
dcterms:title: CrowS-Pairs

dcterms:creator: Chandler May
Alex Wang
Shikha Bordia
Samuel R. Bowman
Rachel Rudinger
dcterms:description: SEAT (Sentence Embedding Association Test) is a dataset used to measure social biases in sentence encoders, providing a framework for evaluating biases in language models.
dcterms:title: SEAT (Sentence Embedding Association Test)

dcterms:description: Muril is a dataset that provides multilingual representations for Indian languages, facilitating the understanding of language models in the Indian context.
dcterms:title: Muril

dcterms:creator: Sumanth Doddapaneni
Rahul Aralikatte
Gowtham Ramesh
Shreya Goyal
Mitesh M. Khapra
Anoop Kunchukuttan
Pratyush Kumar
dcterms:description: IndicBERT is a dataset aimed at building monolingual corpora, benchmarks, and models for Indic languages, addressing the need for language resources in the Indian context.
dcterms:title: IndicBERT

dcterms:creator: M. Nadeem
A. Bethke
S. Reddy
dcterms:description: StereoSet is a dataset designed to measure stereotypical bias in pretrained language models, providing a framework for evaluating biases in language generation.
dcterms:title: StereoSet

dcterms:creator: Akshita Jha
Aida Davani
Chandan K. Reddy
Shachi Dave
Vinodkumar Prabhakaran
Sunipa Dev
dcterms:description: SEEGULL is a stereotype benchmark with broad geo-cultural coverage leveraging generative models, aimed at evaluating biases in language models.
dcterms:title: SEEGULL

dcterms:description: IndiBias is a comprehensive benchmarking dataset designed specifically for evaluating social biases in the Indian context, containing sentence pairs and tuples for bias measurement.
dcterms:title: IndiBias
